issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
issue.errorLine1: return if (hours > 0) String.format(hoursFormat, hours, min - hours * 60, sec) else String.format(noHoursFormat, min, sec)

issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
issue.errorLine1: return if (hours > 0) String.format(hoursFormat, hours, min - hours * 60, sec) else String.format(noHoursFormat, min, sec)
